alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; St. Louis (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 26 at 9:15PM CDT until March 30 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Meramec River at Valley Park. Meramec River near Eureka. Meramec River near Sullivan. Meramec River near Arnold. Meramec River at Fenton. Meramec River at Pacific. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Meramec River near Eureka. * WHEN...Until late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, The Route 66 State Park road to the equestrian trailhead and to the boat ramp is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 25.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:30 PM CDT Sunday was 25.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 26.7 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 19.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7:00 am) Location Stg Stage Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Meramec River Eureka 19.0 25.0 24.2 18.3 9.8 8.0 7.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
